column4: Hey people. thinking of getting a external HDD to back my stuff up on, will this work on ubuntu?
I don't even have to look at it.
it says it requires windows to run so just curious
They put that all over stuff.  Really drives me nuts.  Your monitor most certainly doesn't need windows to run either but they have no problem stamping their stupid stickers on it
Those things are a pain with linux
Some are.  I can't tell you which are.  I don't have any
What is your current set up?
Windows 7 with ubuntu on a sepperate partition
I don't see the downside of using linux exclusively :)
You don't have to reinstall.  Boot a live CD and simply re-arrange the existing partitions so that the windows 7 one is gone and the linux one is expanded.  You might have to fix grub though.
I've been windows free for 2 years.  It depends entirely on the person.
Sounds to me like you're golden.
You should be!  It's a great feeling :D
That's how long it took me to make the switch
